name: 2023 10th International Conference on Education and Psychological Sciences
content: Publicationï¼š Accepted papers will be published in one of the following open access journal on the basis of the paper topics: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET, ISSN: 2010-3689) Frequency: Monthly | DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), EI(INSPEC, IET), EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Paper Template: http://www.iceps.org/IJIET\_template.doc International Journal of Social Science and Humanity (IJSSH, ISSN: 2010-3646) Frequency: Quarterly | DOI: 10.18178/IJSSH Indexing: Google Scholar, Index Copernicus, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library Paper Template: http://www.iceps.org/IJSSH\_template.doc
